name: Summon Infernal Host
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Rival Guide. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, F/DF (strip of rune-inscribed parchment)
effect: 1d4+1 lesser host devils or 1 greater host devil
text: This spell functions as summon monster V, save that it can only be used to summon host devils. These noxious flying devils are also known as gaavs and magaavs.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、器材/法器 (一条铭刻符文的羊皮纸)
effect_zh: 1d4+1只次级群舞魔(lesser host devil)或1只高等群舞魔(greater host devil)
text_zh: 本法术如同召唤怪物V(summon monster V)，但它只能用来召唤群舞魔。这些污秽的飞行恶魔，也被称为狩魂魔(gaavs)与首领狩魂魔(magaavs)，在PF战役设定：永罪之书首辑，黑暗诸侯P.58中有详细描述。
